name: DrinkOrPoise
description:
A  drag and drop memory game! 

Help Nutty to drink the right number of bottles by dragging it in his mouth, but be careful,  if Nutty drink too much bottles of the same type he get poisoned (and of course you don't know how much bottles Nutty has drank!).

Nutty can also eat walnut that stop the timer of stage and question mark, that show you how much bottles Nutty has drank.

Have fun and beat the record!
